title: Windows Black Seven 24.5 Alien USB Edition (by KIRK) - TEAM OS [
description:
Windows Black Seven 24.5 Alien USB Edition

General Information

Type.................: OS
Platform.............: 64 Bit
Image Format.........: .iso
Burn Tested..........: USB ready
Release Date..........: July 28 2014

Because I listen, I am releasing this build to the public, simplified perfected.

Changelog

Replaced the Grub GFX menu with Native BCD like my older builds with full USB Support
I have added Rufus to the Autorun menu as well as the default script to Prepare and copy USB
You are good to go, USB all the way is better. You don't even need an iso just the build in a folder
and run my USB Script By ROn AKA Nightwolfe.

New builds will be around after the 15th of each month as I plan on including the Simplex Update pack in each build and they
release the Update pack on the 15th of each month.
Added VmWare 10.03 Workstation
Oracle virtualbox 4.3.14
Updated firefox to 31 Final
Changed default theme to a better one, easier to see things yet still a dark themes but nice and bright.
Credits again to Tucker for the great theme.
Builds will be Native BCD from now on as well as USB. I mean you can still burn it to a Blu-ray
just like a vanilla Windows 7 due to native BCD.
Active@Boot Disk 8.53 is also on BCD Boot Menu.

I have also added some killer themes that I leeched around the web.

Install Notes below from 24 mostly apply to 24.5

Critical Updates to July 15th integrated
Included Simplix Pack to update Live Win7 Build R2-14.7.15 R2 (takes a while to install but its like a service pack).

Changelog:

Changes in version 7.14.15
Added KB2966583-x86-x64, KB2973337-x86-x64, KB2973351-x86-x64
Added KB2952664-v3-x86-x64 (replaces KB2952664-v2.3-x86-x64, Windows 7 only)
Added KB2961072-x86-x64 (replaces KB2875783-x64)
Added KB2962872-v8-x86-x64 (replaces KB2957689-v8-x86-x64)
Added KB2962872-v9-x86-x64 (replaces KB2957689-v9-x86-x64)
Added KB2962872-v10-x86-x64 (replaces KB2957689-v10-x86-x64)
Added KB2962872-v11-x86-x64 (replaces KB2957689-v11-x86-x64)
Added KB2963952-v11-x86-x64 (replaces KB2963950-v11-x86-x64)
Added KB2971850-x86-x64 (replaces KB2835364-x86-x64)
Added KB2972280-x86-x64 (replaces KB2929961-x86-x64)
Added KB2973201-x86-x64 (replaces KB2930275-x86-x64)
Added Windows Update Agent 7.6.7600.320 (replaces version 7.6.7600.256)
Next update excluded from integration: KB2603229-x64
Added the following interface languages: Estonian, Brazilian Portuguese and Spanish international.
Fixed a problem with the integration of updates to Dutch distribution of Windows 7.

Video Drivers install at Specialized Pass.
Drivers Slipstreamed: All nvidea, all Intel, and all ATI.


.netframework 4.52 full installs at oobe pass.


2000 more Fonts added

WPI with 72 Silent apps totaling 4.62 Gigs, Office 2013 alone is 1.9 Gigs due to updates.

Apps- no cracks used in this build, 100 percent clean. I make my own batch files and some shitty
Antivirus may flag them as generic something or other. but they are not they use a hide command prompt.
